Product.Name: Acidophilus Plus (Cytoplan)
Product.ShortDescription: Acidophilus Plus contains Lactobacillus acidophilus and a further eight live native bacterial strains, plus a small amount of fructo-oligosaccharides (FOS). Ideal for children aged four years upwards and adults up to their early 40s. It can also be taken by older adults but we generally recommend our Fos-A-Dophilus for over 40s. Does not require refrigeration.
Product.FullDescription:
Description:

Acidophilus Plus contains Lactobacillus acidophilus and a further eight live native bacterial strains, plus a small amount of fructo-oligosaccharides (FOS).

  • The strains included in Acidophilus Plus are Lactobacillus acidophilus, Lactococcus casei, Lactobacillus rhamnosus, Lactobacillus plantarum, Bifidobacterium breve, Bifidobacterium bifidum, Bifidobacterium longum and Streptococcus thermophilus
  • This blend of native bacterial strains is designed to have activity throughout the whole digestive tract, both the distal end of the small intestine and throughout the colon
  • Acidophilus Plus capsules comprise specially cultivated strains that will survive the challenges of stomach acid and bile in the human digestive tract
  • Comprising pure, naturally fermented bacterial strains, antibiotic-resistant and stable at room temperature - so no need to refrigerate
  • One Acidophilus Plus capsule provides on average 35mg of fructo-oligosaccharides (FOS) and a culture of 3.5 billion live native bacteria (live viable dehydrated bacteria)
  • The nine native bacterial strains in this supplement mean it is ideal for children aged four years upwards and adults up to their early 40s. For those aged 40 plus please look at our Fos-A-Dophilus product

 

Nutritional Information:

Each Acidophilus Capsule will provide on average a culture of 3.5 billion bacteria (at time of manufacture) consisting of:

Active Nutrient Strength %NRV*
Lactobacillus Acidophilus
Lactooccus Lactis
Lactobacillus Rhamnosus
Lactobacillus Casei
Lactobacillus Plantarum
Bifidobacterium Breve
Bifidobacterium Bifidum
Bifidobacterium Longum
Streptoccus Thermophilius

 

+NRV = Nutritional Reference Value
* Indicates no NRV
 
Ingredients:

Lactobacillus acidophilus ROO52; lactococcus lactis R1058; lactobacillus rhamnosus ROO11; lactobacillus casei RO215; lactobacillus plantarum R1O12; bifidobacterium breve ROO7O; bifidobacterium bifidum ROO71; bifidobacterium longum RO175; streptococcus thermophilus; fructo-oligosaccharides (FOS); Vegetable Cellulose (capsule shell); potato starch; ascorbic acid. *Live viable dehydrated bacteria.

 
Suggested Intake:

1-2 capsules daily, taken ½ hour after food, or at the end of the meal, or as directed by a practitioner.

For those travelling: Start taking Acidophilus Plus for at least 7 days prior to the start of your journey. During travel take the recommended daily dose, and continue to do so for at least 7 days following the end of your travels.

 

Suitable for:

Vegetarians and for people with Candida, yeast and lactose sensitivities.

 

Contraindications:

None.

 

Non-Active Ingredients:

Vegetable cellulose (capsule shell), potato starch, ascorbic acid.

 
Non-GM & Free From:

Wheat; yeast; gluten; added sugars, colourings, flavourings & preservatives. The product has been analysed and no dairy proteins are present

 

Storage:

Keep cool, dry & out of direct sunlight. No need to refrigerate.

Product.Name: Add your existing DNA test to your ScreenMe programme
Product.ShortDescription: We will analyse your DNA results and reports from third party service providers and  include them in further tailoring your nutrition and lifestyle to your genes. Please note this is an add on to any ScreenMe test or programme.
Product.FullDescription:
If you have already done DNA testing with other companies such as DNAfit, 23andme and Nordic labs our team can help you analyse and understand your results better and include those results in  your ScreenMe tailored nutrition and lifestyle plan. 

No waiting, no new sample - just send us your results to personalise your nutrition & fitness.

Who is this for?

Anyone joing ScreenMe who has already carried out DNA testin with a third party company.

How it works?

1) You simply share your DNA results and reports with your ScreenMe team using the email support@screenme.co.uk. 

2) Our scientists will review your results, reports and if provided with raw data even check for any factors missed by the company. 

3) Your results will then be used to tailor your nutrition, lifestyle and supplement requirements.

Product.Name: Advanced Fertility Hormone Package
Product.ShortDescription: Our at-home tests give you a deep look at your fertility, hormonal and reproductive health without the need for a visit to a clinic or nurse. This, combined with support and knowledge from our expert team, will allow you to address any issues that arise, being guided through any necessary changes.
Product.FullDescription:
Ideal if you

  • Want an in-depth understanding of your fertility and reproductive system through a deep dive into your sex hormones.
  • Want to highlight potential current and future fertility issues
  • Want the tools to make changes to improve chances of a successful pregnancy.

About this test:

  • This consists of an easy to do, at-home finger-prick blood test.
  • This test will give you a detailed understanding of your fertility, hormonal and reproductive health.
  • At ScreenMe, our expert scientists and nutritionists ensure you receive all the information and guidance you need to restore and improve your health and wellness. Your results will be personally assessed by a range of health professionals.
  • Our partner labs are trusted by the NHS & private clinics, so you can expect the highest standards from our accredited laboratories.

What the Advanced Fertility Package includes

  • Test 9 major sex hormones including; Oestrogen, FSH, LH, free androgen index, AMH, testosterone, DHEA-S, SHBG, Prolactin.
  • NHS registered doctor’s report
  • Tailored advice on nutrition and lifestyle, based off of your results
  • Free consultation with our experts

What the test measures

  • AMH
    • Indicates your egg reserves
  • DHEA-S
    • Helps us to understand your hormone regulation and oestrogen production
  • Follicle-Stimulating Hormone
    • Helps us to understand your hormonal regulation, menstrual cycle and ovulation.
  • Luteinizing Hormone
    • Helps us to understand the regulation of your menstrual cycle, hormone regulation, and ovulation.
  • Prolactin
    • Has been associated with low libido and erectile disfunction
  • Testosterone
    • This sex hormone influences many aspects of fertility
  • Free Androgen Index
    • Used to look for abnormal androgen levels
  • SHBG
    • Helps us to understand your hormonal regulation, likelihood of PCOS, insulin resistance, and more

How it works?

  • Take your test
    • Collect your blood sample from the comfort of your own home
  • Post your sample
    • Use the pre-paid envelope provided to post your sample back to our laboratory, on the same day you took the test.
  • Get your individual results
    • Access your personal dashboard to view your results, reports, recommended nutrition, and more.
  • Have your free consultation
    • Speak to our experts who guide you through your results and create your own bespoke plan of action, recommendations, nutritional advice; including tailored supplement and product recommendations

Special Instructions

  • When to take the test:
    • Take your blood test between day 2 and 5 of your period.
    • It can be taken at any time if you are not having periods
  • Avoid taking biotin supplements for 2 days prior to the test
  • Hormonal medication, steroids or contraception can affect the results of this test
  • Avoid taking the sample from a finger used to handle hormone gels or hormone pessaries in the past 4 weeks

Product.Name: Advanced gut microbiome test
Product.ShortDescription:
Discover the world of microbiome in your gut by using cutting edge science.
The diversity of the bacteria and yeast living in your gut is directly related to many health functions such as digestive health, immune system, weight control, metabolism, cardiovascular health and mood. Using this test learn how to influence your microbiome to improve your health. Now, you can discover the secrets of your microbiome form the comfort of your home
Product.FullDescription:
About this test:

This consists of an easy to do, at-home stool swab test.

Recent scientific research has shown that the bacteria living in our gut are very important to our health and everyday quality of life.

The complex microbial environment in our gut influences many health functions such as digestive health, immune health, metabolism, mood, energy levels and even food cravings.

Discovering secrets of the microbiome allows you to create a more diverse and healthier microbial ecosystem that supports many health functions associated with it.

At ScreenMe our expert scientists and nutritionists ensure you receive all the information and guidance you need to restore and maintain a healthy microbiome and improve your health and wellness.

 

What the Microbiome Screen includes:

1) We will test your gut's bacteria and yeast composition

2) Personalised nutritional and lifestyle guidance tailored to your specific results and needs

3) Access to the ScreenMe platform to find all your fertility products and nutritional guidance all-in-one place.

4) Unlimited email support 

 

What’s included in the test:

Microbiome screening:

  • Diversity Score
  • Energy Score
  • Metabolic Score
  • Butyrate Score
  • Probiotic Bacteria Scores
  • Weight Guardians Scores 
  • Yest levels
  • Yeast species

 

Once measured, it is easier to manage:

At ScreenMe we believe that humans are better than computer artificial intelligence:

Your results will be assessed personally by a range of health professionals such as:

  • Accredited nutritionist
  • Scientist

Our nutritionist will select food items tailored to your specific needs to help guide you through your health journey. All your results and recommendation can be accessed at any time and anyplace on the online ScreenMe platform.

How it works:

1)     Take your test:

Collect your stool sample at home.

2)     Post your sample:

Post your sample back on the same day you take the test to our laboratory using the pre-paid envelope provided.

3)     View your dashboard:

View your results and reports as well as recommended foods and recipes on your ScreenMe platform. Here you can also purchase your tailored supplements from our Health Shop.

 

Laboratories and products, you can trust:

Our partner labs are trusted by the NHS and private clinics, so you can expect the highest standards from our accredited laboratories.

At ScreenMe our health professionals spend a lot of time reviewing and selecting the highest quality supplements and health products available on the market, so you don’t have to. From testing through to health consultations and products all this can be easily accessed in the ScreenMe Health Shop.

Test your heart, liver, and in-depth thyroid health, and examine your risk of developing type 2 diabetes. Discover if you're getting enough key nutrients from your diet and ensure your body inflammation is in check keeping your body in a healthy state.

Who is it for:

If you are looking to become proactive about preventive health and optimise your overall wellbeing, this test is right for you.

Some of the biggest health issues in the first world can be prevented by careful monitoring of health markers and correction of unhealthy lifestyle habits. In addition, our bodies often lack vital nutrients, stopping us from performing to the best of our abilities.

This health marker test will give you an inside-out understanding of your major organ and health functions as well as the levels of four vital nutrients.

With the results of these tests and advice from ScreenMe professionals, take control of your health, reduce risks of developing some major diseases and focus on the areas you need most.

  • Diabetes risk
  • Inflammation
  • Vitamins
  • Minerals

4) Access to the ScreenMe platform to find all your fertility products and nutritional guidance all-in-one place.

5) Unlimited email support

This test will provide you with the following results:

 

  • Lipid profile: LDL Cholesterol, HDL Cholesterol, Cholesterol, Triglycerides and Cholesterol ratios
  • Liver Profile: Gamma GT, Alanine transferase, Albumin, Alkaline phosphatase, Globulin, Total protein and Bilirubin
  • Thyroid profile: TSH, FT4, FT3, anti-thyroglobulin antibodies, anti-thyroid peroxidase antibodies
  • Diabetes risk: HbA1c
  • Inflammation: CRP-hs
  • Vitamins: Vitamin B12, Vitamin B9 and Vitamin D
  • Iron profile: Iron, Ferritin, UIBC and TIBC

Collect your blood sample at home.

Product.Name: Advanced vaginal health test
Product.ShortDescription: The most comprehensive vaginal health test screening all bacteria and yeast in your vagina. ScreenMe's advanced vaginal health test looks at your entire vaginal ecosystem which is responsible for lowering the risk of bacterial vaginosis, thrush, recurrent UTIs, STDs, fertility complications and HPV infection. Vaginal microbiome provides vital insight into a woman's health and is necessary for preventative healthcare.
Product.FullDescription:
Ideal if you:

  • want an in-depth look into your vaginal and sexual health whether you are trying to conceive or are sexually active. 
  • suffer from symptoms like a burning sensation, pain following sex, pain on urination, unpleasant smell, swelling, redness or abnormal discharge
  • suffer from recurrent vaginal infections or UTIs
  • have experience misscariage 
  • have had STD's
  • want to reduce risk of STDs, HPV and ovarian cancer

Why you should test your vaginal microbiome

✔ Support fertility
✔ Reduce, BV, thrush, STD and HPV risks
✔ Reduce risks for cervical cancer
✔ Protect against UTIs
✔ Encourage a healthy vaginal lining (decreases inflammation)

What the vaginal health test includes:

  • Vaginal microbiome sample collection kit
  • Comprehensive report of vaginal health from your ScreenMe PhD scientist
  • Recommended supplements

What you learn:

Our test will help assess the entire bacterial and yeast community living in your vagina and what health affects they have. You will learn about:

  • Full list of 100% of bacteria and yeast present in your vagina and their percentages
  • Your vaginal diversity 
  • Your vaginal community state type 
  • Your vaginal bacterial composition including good bacteria and pathogenic bacteria
  • Your vaginal yeast composition including candida
  • How your vaginal type is impacting your health and feritlity
  • How you can enhance you fertility, protect yourself against UTIs, vaginosis, STDs and reduce risk of cervical cancer 

What you learn:

Unlike other tests that are limited to screening certain bacteria and yeast the ScreenMe advanced test screens ALL bacteria and yeast present in your vagina. 

Once measured, it is easier to manage:

Your results will be assessed personally by a range of health professionals such as:

  • Accredited medical doctors
  • Nutritionist
  • Scientist

Collect your vaginal microbiome sample at home.

2)     Post your sample:

Post your sample back on the same day you take the test to our laboratory using the pre-paid envelope provided (prepaid envelopes only included in the UK)

3)    Receive your results:

Your results and report will be ready in 4-6 weeks and sent through email and you will receive your tailored food, recipes and recommended supplements on the ScreenMe dashoard.

Need more support? You also have access to a free 20 minute consultation to go over your results and answer any questions you may have.

Product.Name: Alpha Lipoic Acid 300mg (Lamberts)
Product.ShortDescription:
An important antioxidant involved in energy production
Each tablet provides a full 300mg of Alpha Lipoic Acid
Difficult to obtain therapeutic amounts of Alpha Lipoic Acid through the diet alone
Supplementation widely recommended by practitioners, particularly for those worn down by oxidative stress
One of the most potent products on the market and fantastic value for money
Product.FullDescription:
Product Description 

Alpha Lipoic Acid (ALA) is a vitamin-like substance that has generated much interest in the last few years, especially with regards to both its ability to act as a powerful antioxidant and because of its role in energy production. Our bodies are able to make ALA although a dietary source is still important, and it is found in almost all foods, especially in kidney, liver, spinach, and broccoli.

For those patients worn down by oxidative stress a supplement of ALA will help ensure the body has sufficient levels of this important compound. There has been considerable interest in the use of ALA in certain conditions, a recognition that this compound can be useful when taken orally.

Each of these tablets provides a full 300mg of Alpha Lipoic Acid, making it one of the most potent products on the market.

For diabetics: Please consult a doctor prior to recommending alpha lipoic acid as it may enhance insulin activity.

Other Information 

Allergen advice
See presentation section for ingredients listed in bold.
The following list of allergens are excluded: Wheat, Barley, Soya, Eggs, Milk (and milk products), Lactose, Nuts, Sulphites, Celery, Fish, Shellfish, Yeast and Gluten containing ingredients.

Cautions
This product is not recommended for pregnant or lactating women.
Those suffering from diabetes should consult a doctor prior to taking alpha lipoic acid as it may enhance insulin activity.

Storage instructions
To be stored in a cool dry place and protected from light.

Legal Category
Food supplement.

Presentation 

A pale green oval coated tablet.

Each tablet delivers:

Alpha Lipoic Acid 300mg


Tableted With:
Calcium Carbonate, Cellulose, Anticaking agents (Magnesium Stearate, Silicon Dioxide & Stearic Acid), Tablet Coating (Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Glycerine).

Disintegration Time
Less than 1 hour.

Suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

Usage and administration 

Take up to 2 tablets daily with or without food or as directed by a practitioner or pharmacist.
For general antioxidant support a lower dose of one tablet daily may be used.

Product.Name: At home phlebotomy service
Product.ShortDescription: A qualified nurse will visit you in your home and collect your blood sample
Product.FullDescription:
Who is this for?

  • Those who struggle with finger prick blood sample collection
  • Those with poor circulation 
  • Those who prefer a nruse collecting their sample 

How does it work?

  1. A qualified nurse will contact you and arrange a suitable time to visit you at home. 
  2. Your nurse will draw blood from your vein and fill your ScreenMe tubes for you.
  3. Your nurse will drop off your sample at the post office and send you your tracking number.

Product.Name: Basic health  test
Product.ShortDescription: This test will look at your heart, liver and thyroid health markers. Check if your lifestyle is affecting your energy, mood, weight, skin and sleep and increasing your risk of heart, liver and thyroid disorders. Get all the essential information about your health status with our at-home finger prick test.
Product.FullDescription:
Who is it for:

Heart disease, liver and metabolic disease are three of the most common first world diseases. These are usually caused by an unhealthy lifestyle.

Screening your lipid and liver profile is the most basic way to show how your lifestyle and eating habits are affecting your heart and liver.

The thyroid gland produces hormones that are important in regulating many health functions including metabolism, weight, sleep, energy and cardiovascular health.

This basic health marker test will give you a deeper understanding of how you can take control of your cardiovascular, liver and metabolic health.

 

What the Bere Essentials Health Maker Test  includes:

1) We will test your blood makers related to:

  • Heart health
  • Liver
  • Thyroid

3) Personalised nutritional and lifestyle guidance tailored to your specific results and needs

4) Access to the ScreenMe platform to find all your fertility products and nutritional guidance all-in-one place.

5) Unlimited email support  

 

What’s included in the test:

 

  • Lipid profile: LDL Cholesterol, HDL Cholesterol, Cholesterol, Triglycerides and Cholesterol ratios
  • Liver Profile: Gamma GT, Alanine transferase, Albumin, Alkaline phosphatase, Globulin, Total protein and Bilirubin
  • Thyroid profile: TSH, FT4

 

Once measured, it is easier to manage:

At ScreenMe we believe that humans are better than computer artificial intelligence:

Your results will be assessed personally by a range of health professionals such as:

  • Accredited medical doctors
  • Nutritionist
  • Scientist

You will receive tailored nutrition, lifestyle and supplement advice. Our nutritionist will then select food items tailored to your specific needs to help guide you through your health journey. All your results and recommendation can be accessed at anytime and anyplace on the online ScreenMe platform.

 

How it works:

1)     Take your test:

Collect your blood sample at home.

2)     Post your sample:

Post your sample back on the same day you take the test to our laboratory using the pre-paid envelope provided.

3)     View your dashboard:

View your results and reports as well as recommended foods and recipes on your ScreenMe platform. Here you can also purchase your tailored supplements from our Health Shop.

Product.Name: Basic hormonal balance test
Product.ShortDescription: A simple finger-prick blood test to for LH, FSH, oestradiol, testosterone, SHBG, Free androgen index and prolactin providing an insight into sex hormones and hormonal balance.
Product.FullDescription:
Who is it for:

Do you want a comprehensive health check you can do safely at home? This test provides an in-depth look into your reproductive and hormonal health without the need for a clinic or nurse visit. It also includes a report from your NHS registered medical doctor and tailored nutrition placed into your ScreenMe eat well plate.

 

What’s included:

1) We will test your blood makers related to:

  • Hormone levels

2) Access to the ScreenMe platform to find results, reports and database of fertility friendly foods and recipes

4) Unlimited email support 

 

What’s tested:

This test will provide you with the following results: 

Hormones levels

  •        Follicle-Stimulating Hormone: It helps us understand your hormonal regulation
  •        Oestradiol: In high amounts can interfere with normal sperm production
  •        Luteinizing Hormone: It helps us understand your hormonal regulation
  •        Prolactin: Has been associated with low libido and erectile dysfunction
  •        SHBG: controls how much testosterone is available to the body for use
  •        Testosterone: sex hormone affecting many aspects of fertility in men 
  •        Free Androgen Index: Used to look for abnormal androgen levels 

  

Once measured, it is easier to manage:

At ScreenMe we believe that humans are better than computer artificial intelligence. Your results will be assessed personally by a range of health professionals such as:

  • Accredited medical doctors
  • Fertility Nutritionist
  • Specialist Scientist

Our nutritionist will select food items tailored to your specific needs to help guide you through your health and fertility journey. All your results and recommendation can be accessed at anytime and anyplace on the online ScreenMe platform.

 

How it works:

1)     Take your test:

Collect your blood sample at home.

2)     Post your sample:

Post your sample back on the same day you take the test to our laboratory using the pre-paid envelope provided.

3)     View your dashboard:

View your results and reports as well as recommended foods and recipes on your ScreenMe platform. Here you can also purchase your tailored supplements from our Health Shop.

 

Special Instructions:

Avoid taking biotin supplements for 2 days prior to this test. Hormonal medication or steroids can affect the results of this test.  Avoid taking the sample from a finger used to handle hormone gels or hormone pessaries in the past 4 weeks.

Product.Name: Bio.Me Barrier 120g (invivo)
Product.ShortDescription: Clinically researched probiotics for the gut-brain microbiome and intestinal barrier health.
Product.FullDescription:
Description:

A clinically-researched multi-strain live bacteria for the gut-brain microbiome and intestinal barrier health, which works to support the immune response and tight junctions and to break down lipopolysaccharides.

Also containing Probioact Technology
PROBIOACT® stands for probiotic activity and is a technology developed by Winclove which focuses on the ingredients that surround the probiotic bacteria.

The PROBIOACT® Technology consists of product-specific protective and nutritional ingredients, which have been selected and extensively tested to:
• Keep the probiotics stable at room temperature, and retain high cell counts during shelf life with a water-soluble carrier matrix of starches and maltodextrin.
• Protect against osmotic shock during rehydration and consumption with minerals.
• Protect against stomach acid, bile and digestive enzymes in the GI-tract with vegetable proteins.
• Optimise the metabolic activity at the right time and place with an enzyme, prebiotic and vegetable protein nutrient resource.

 

Nutritional Information:

DAIRY FREE.   GLUTEN FREE.   GMP.   NON GMO.   STEVIA FREE.   VEGAN

 

Ingredients:

Ecologic® Barrier Probiotics 10 billion CFU Bifidobacterium bifidum W23, Bifidobacterium lactis W51, Bifidobacterium lactis W52, Lactobacillus acidophilus W37, Lactobacillus brevis W63, Lactobacillus casei W56, Lactobacillus salivarius W24, Lactococcus lactis W19, Lactococcus lactis W58. Other Ingredients: Maize Starch, Maltodextrin, Inulin, Polydextrose, Vegetable Protein, Potassium Chloride, Magnesium Sulphate, Manganese Sulphate.

When taking antibiotics, wait 2-3 hours before taking Invivo Bio.Me Barrier.

 
Directions:

Mix 2g (1 tsp) daily into 100ml of water.  Leave for 1 minute.  Stir and take on an empty stomach.

Do not exceed the recommended dose, unless advised by your healthcare professional.

Product.Name: Bio.Me Femme V 30 Capsule (invivo)
Product.ShortDescription: Clinically researched probiotics for the vaginal microbiome containing keystone Lactobacillus species.
Product.FullDescription:
Description:

A multi-species probiotic with specific strains that have undergone in-vivo, ex-vivo and in-vitro testing for their efficacy, mode of action and safety.

Bio.Me Femme V is the only available vaginal probiotic containing Lactobacillus crispatus on the market. This multi-species formula contains keystone Lactobacilli for optimal lactic acid production, pH and pathobiont inhibition.

The probiotic has undergone human clinical trials which have shown colonisation in the vagina after oral ingestion, as well as a significantly reduced reoccurrence of bacterial vaginosis after antibiotic treatment.

 

Nutritional Information:

DAIRY FREE.   GLUTEN FREE.   GMP.   NON GMO.   STEVIA FREE.   VEGAN

 

Ingredients:

SynBalance® 3 billion CFU SynBalance® LP (L. plantarum – DSM 24937), SynBalance® BL (B. lactis – LMG P-29510), SynBalance® LRh (L. rhamnosus – LMG P-29513), SynBalance® LG (L. gasseri – LMG P-29638), SynBalance® LCr (L. crispatus– LMG P-31003)Other Ingredients: Maltodextrin, Corn starch, Microcrystalline cellulose, Capsule Shell: Hydroxypropylmethylcellulose.

Take 1 capsule per day.  Do not exceed the recommended dose, unless advised by your healthcare professional.

Product.Name: Bio.Me Prebio PHGG 225g (invivo)
Product.ShortDescription: Organic, low FODMAP,  water soluble prebiotic fibre to support microbial diversity and balance faecal movements.
Product.FullDescription:
Description:

A colourless, tasteless prebiotic fibre derived from the seeds of the guar plant. This powder dissolves in water and has shown to be well tolerated in individuals with bowel symptoms, including IBS and SIBO.

Clinically, PHGG is used as:
– A bulking agent and prebiotic to help balance faecal movements – both constipation and diarrhoea
– A prebiotic food source to increase Bifidobacterium and other SCFA producing bacteria
– A dietary fibre to increase satiety

 

Nutritional Information:

DAIRY FREE.   GLUTEN FREE.   GMP.   NON GMO.   STEVIA FREE.   VEGAN

 

Ingredients:

Active per 5g (4 tsp) dose:

Sunfibre - Organically Partially Hydrolysed Guar Gum


Directions:

Mix 5g (1 tsp) daily into at least 200ml of water or other beverage of choice. Stir and take on an empty stomach.
If new to taking PHGG it is advisable to start with 1g dosage and slowly increase to 5g dosage to prevent abdominal discomfort.
Do not exceed the recommended dose, unless advised by your healthcare professional.

Activated Probiotics are a premium, practitioner only product and therefore are only available once you have had been referred by a practitioner. Please book an appointment with one of our experts, or receive your free consultation when you purchase one of our tests.

30 capsules. A live bacteria supplement from Activated Probiotics with clinically trialled strains specifically for women.
Product.FullDescription:
Ingredients:

Lactobacillus crispatus LCR01 (DSM 24619), Lactobacillus fermentum LF10 (DSM 19187), Lactobacillus acidophilus LA02 (DSM 21712), maltodextrin, hypromellose, silicon dioxide

Additives:

Maltodextrin, hypromellose, silicon dioxide

Shelf-stable:

refrigeration not required

No added:

GMOS, wheat, gluten, dairy, lactose, fructose, yeast, nuts, seeds, peanut, soy, egg, fish, shellfish, animal derivatives, artifical colours, flavours, sweeteners, or preservatives.

Suitable for vegatarians and vegans

Directions:

Take one capsule daily (with or without food), or as directed by your healthcare practitioner.

Storage:

Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight and heat

Science:

A healthy vaginal microbiome is characterised of Lactobacilli dominance Lactobacilli are beneficial bacteria which are necessary for the production of lactic acid, ehlping to maintain optimial vaginal pH and deter the growth of harmful microorganisms. A deficiency of Lactobacilli can cause vaginal microbiome dybiosis and an overgrowth of pathogenic microorganisms, which is linked to an increased risk of vaginal thrush, bacterial vaginosis and urinary tract infections. Oral probiotic supplments containing strains of Lactobacilli can help to restore a healthy vaginal microbiome and may help to reduce the recurrence of these vaginal infections.

Product.Name: Cherry C (Cytoplan)
Product.ShortDescription: The fruit of the acerola cherry tree is one of the richest-known natural sources of vitamin C. Acerola cherry also contains a whole array of bioflavonoids, vitamins, minerals and other phytonutrients, making it an ideal food-based source of nutrition. Each capsule provides 200mg of vitamin C. Vitamin C contributes to the protection of cells from oxidative stress, this means that it is an antioxidant.
Product.FullDescription:
Description:

The fruit of the acerola cherry tree is rich in vitamin C, flavonoids and carotenoids, with the cherry-like fruits being one of the richest-known natural sources of vitamin C. Acerola cherry also contains a whole array of bioflavonoids, vitamins, minerals and other phytonutrients, making it an ideal food-based source of nutrition.

  • Acerola cherry is one of the richest-known natural sources of vitamin C
  • Acerola cherry also contains a whole array of bioflavonoids, making it an ideal food-based source of nutrition
  • Cherry-C capsules contain pure, powdered acerola cherry – a Wholefood source of vitamin C
  • Each 800mg capsule will give you 200mg of vitamin C
  • A well absorbed, retained and utilised, gentle, non-acidic form of vitamin C
  • This product is dried at room temperature and never heated above this during processing
Vitamin C contributes to normal:
  • function of the immune system (including during and after intense physical activity)
  • non-haem iron absorption
  • function of the nervous system
  • energy-yielding metabolism
  • collagen formation for the normal function of blood vessels, bones, cartilage, gums, skin and teeth
  • psychological function
Vitamin C contributes to:
  • the reduction of tiredness and fatigue
  • the regeneration of the reduced form of vitamin E
  • the protection of cells from oxidative stress; this means it is an antioxidant

Product.Name: Choline Bitartrate Powder (Cytoplan)
Product.ShortDescription: Choline is a water-soluble B vitamin. It can be produced in the human body, but natural quantities are often insufficient. It is also available from dietary sources. Choline contributes to normal homocysteine metabolism, lipid metabolism and the maintenance of normal liver function.
Product.FullDescription:
Description:

Choline is a water-soluble B vitamin. It can be produced in the human body, but external sources are also needed. Natural sources of choline include egg yolk, legumes, wheat germ, peanuts and organ meats.

  • Choline is a precursor to acetylcholine, a neurotransmitter (i.e. brain chemical) important for memory; it is also a component of phospholipids which make up cell membranes
  • Low choline intake has been associated with increased fatty liver and raised homocysteine (raised homocysteine is a risk factor for cardiovascular disease and cognitive decline)
  • Choline bitartrate is a gentle and bioavailable form of choline, suitable for those with impaired liver function

 

Choline contributes to normal:

  • homocysteine metabolism
  • lipid metabolism
  • liver function

 

Choline Bitartrate Powder one rounded 3ml teaspoon provides on average:

 
Active Nutrient Strength %NRV*
Choline Bitartrate 3.5g *
Elemental Choline 1.4g *
 
 
+NRV = Nutritional Reference Value
* Indicates no NRV
 

Ingredients:

Soluble Choline Bitartrate powder.

 

Suggested Intake:

Half to one rounded 3ml teaspoon twice daily with food, mixed into water or juice.

 

Suitable for:

Vegetarians, vegans and for people with Candida and yeast sensitivities.

 

Contraindications:

None.

 

Non-Active Ingredients:

None.

 

Non GM & Free From:

GMO, wheat, gluten, soy, dairy, added sugar, colourings & flavourings.

 

Storage:

Keep cool, dry & out of direct sunlight.

Product.Name: Clinical-grade sperm test from home (Mojo)
Product.ShortDescription: Understand and improve your fertility with the Mojo at-home sperm test
Product.FullDescription:
With the Mojo at-home sperm test, you can test your sperm

  • if you want to start or expand your family,
  • if you want to understand your fertility and overall health,
  • if you want to do a vasectomy checkup.

Testing your fertility has never been easier: order Mojo at-home sperm kit, produce the sample at your convenience and schedule a contact-free pick-up.

Once in our Mojo hub, we will measure your sample with the help of the Mojo AISA (Artificial Intelligence Sperm Assessment) system, following the WHO and ISO guidelines. Mojo AISA has been developed with leading fertility clinics in the UK.

With Mojo, you will be able to receive insights into your sperm quality - within 48h. We look at characteristics such as

  • semen volume (ml),
  • sperm concentration (Million/ml),
  • sperm motility (%) and
  • total sperm number (Million).

A Mojo fertility expert will be available for consultation to assist you in your fertility journey, if desired.

The Mojo at-home sperm test kit consists of:

  • Sample cup
  • Time stamp label
  • Instructions for use (IFU) in English
  • Thermally insulated container
  • Drip bottle of transport liquid
  • Cold pack and heat pack
  • Packaging for return shipment

By testing your sperm using MOJO from ScreenMe you will have access to ScreenMe experts to guide you in making healthy changes for you and your sperm.

Product.Name: Co-Enzyme Q10 100mg (Lamberts)
Product.ShortDescription:
Reduced Co-Enzyme Q10
A full 100mg per capsule
Derived from co-enzyme Q10
Of greater significance for those of 40 years plus, or affected by age-related health conditions, due to its enhanced absorption
Easy to take, small capsules
Product.FullDescription:
Product Description 

Ubiquinol is the reduced active form of Co-Enzyme Q10 (ubiquinone). And like, Co-Enzyme Q10, it is critical to the cellular ATP (energy) production cycle. Without the presence of both of these within the body's cells, cellular energy cannot be generated or sustained.

The only way to increase ubiquinol levels in the body was, until recently, from the conversion of it from co-enzyme Q10, which research has shown becomes increasingly difficult with age.

It has taken scientists over a decade to produce ubiquinol for use in supplements and now several years after this success, we are delighted to include it in the Lamberts® range.

Co-Enzyme Q10 will continue to be an important supplement for many. The pre-converted form of co-enzyme Q10, ubiquinol, will however be of greater significance for those of 40 years plus, or those affected by age-related health conditions, due to its enhanced absorption.

Lamberts® Ubiquinol is derived from co-enzyme Q10 that is bio-identical to the co-enzyme Q10 produced within the body (some co-enzyme Q10 products are processed from bacteria or tobacco derivatives). Each easy to take, small capsule provides a full 100mg.
Other Information

The following list of allergens are excluded: Wheat, Barley, Soya, Eggs, Milk (and milk products), Lactose, Nuts, Sulphites, Celery, Fish, Shellfish, Yeast and Gluten containing ingredients.

Each capsule delivers:
Ubiquinol 100mg

Encapsulated With:
Sunflower Seed Oil, Capsule Shell (Gelatin, Glycerin, Colour: Iron Oxide), Silicon Dioxide.

Product.Name: Comprehensive PCOS test
Product.ShortDescription: A comprehensive check of your hormones for PCOS screening.
Product.FullDescription:
Ideal if you:

  • are wanting to screen for PCOS
  • are wanting to identify your PCOS type 
  • are wanting to check your homronal balance

 

What the women's fertility package includes:

  • Tests: Oestrogen, FSH, LH, AMH, Testosterone, DHEA-S, SHBG, Free androgen index, Prolactin 
  • 1x medical doctor’s report
  • Tailored food and recipes database 
  • Recommended supplement advice provided to practitioner 
  • Unlimited email support  

 

What you learn:

Our test will help us assess many areas of your health that are related to fertility and general wellbeing. You will learn about:

  • PCOS health
  • Your hormonal balance 
  • Egg reserves
  • Ovulation health   

Once measured, it is easier to manage:

At ScreenMe we believe that humans are better than computer artificial intelligence:

Your results will be assessed personally by a range of health professionals such as:

  • Accredited medical doctors
  • Nutritionist
  • Scientist

 

How it works:

1)     Take your test:

Collect your blood sample at home.

2)     Post your sample:

Post your sample back on the same day you take the test to our laboratory using the pre-paid envelope provided.

3)     View your dashboard:

View your results and reports as well as recommended foods and recipes on your ScreenMe platform. Here you can also purchase your tailored supplements from our Health Shop.

 

How long it takes:

Results are usually available 5-7 days following posting of your sample

Special Instructions:

Take your blood test between day 2 and 5 of your period. It can be taken at any time if you are not having periods. Avoid taking biotin supplements for 2 days prior to this test. HRT and contraceptive pills can affect the results of this test.  Avoid taking the sample from a finger used to handle hormone gels or hormone pessaries in the past 4 weeks. 

 

Laboratories and products, you can trust:

Our partner labs are trusted by the NHS and private clinics, so you can expect the highest standards from our accredited laboratories.

At ScreenMe our health professionals spend a lot of time reviewing and selecting the highest quality supplements and health products available on the market, so you don’t have to. From testing through to health consultations and products all this can be easily accessed in the ScreenMe Health Shop.

Product.Name: CoQ10 Multi-30 capsules (Cytoplan)
Product.ShortDescription: CoQ10 Multi is our most comprehensive Wholefood multivitamin and mineral formula available incorporating CoQ10, beta glucan, and excellent all-round vitamin and mineral levels. A low iron formula so ideal for men and post-menopausal women; however, it may also be taken by younger women looking for a multi that includes CoQ10 and higher levels of vitamin B12.
Product.FullDescription:
Description:

CoQ10 Multi is our most comprehensive Wholefood multivitamin and mineral formula available incorporating CoQ10 (CoQ10), beta glucan, and good all-round vitamin and mineral levels including excellent levels of vitamins C and D3 and both active forms of vitamin B12.

  • This Wholefood multivitamin and mineral formula is high in B-complex vitamins (especially B12) and vitamin C
  • This Wholefood multivitamin supplement has excellent levels of the sunshine vitamin, vitamin D. Those at particular risk of vitamin D deficiency are the elderly (65+ years), people who rarely get outdoors (lack of sunshine) and people with dark skin. Vitamin D is provided as D3, the most bioeffective form, from lichen, which is also suitable for vegans
  • Includes excellent levels of trace minerals - zinc, selenium, chromium and others
  • Minerals are provided by an edible species of Brassica, a cruciferous vegetable similar to broccoli, which is grown hydroponically. This edible species of Brassica is ideal for producing supplements where higher levels of minerals are required than would normally be present in the food we eat
  • CoQ10 is an antioxidant synthesised in the body. It is a vital part of all energy production in the mitochondria, the power houses of the cells, and CoQ10 can become seriously depleted as we get older
  • The heart muscles are permanently active and thus use significant quantities of CoQ10
  • Suitable levels of CoQ10 are even more necessary for those taking statin medication, as these drugs can inhibit the body’s production of CoQ10
  • This supplement also contains 1,3, 1,6 beta glucan. We also include 1,3, 1,6 beta glucan in our Immunovite supplement
  • The excellent all-round levels of nutrients in this formula, especially vitamin B12 (included as methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin which are both active forms), vitamin D3 and CoQ10, make this an ideal Wholefood multivitamin and mineral formula for men and post-menopausal women
    • Vitamins C, E, selenium and zinc are all included in this multi and contribute to the protection of cells from oxidative stress; this means they are antioxidants

Product.Name: Covid-19 Vaccine Immunity Test
Product.ShortDescription: Find out if you have made antibodies following a COVID-19 Vaccination.
Product.FullDescription:
ABOUT THIS TEST

This test looks for COVID-19 spike protein antibodies in a blood sample. All currently available vaccines use the spike protein to produce an immune response. A positive antibody result indicates that you have produced antibodies in response to the vaccine.   

What does a positive result mean? 

A positive test result indicates that you have had an immune response to vaccination or the virus. Our test will also provide a numerical value that indicates the amount of antibodies. There is currently not enough data to indicate whether or not a higher number of antibodies indicates a stronger immune response or a greater level of immunity.  

What does a negative result mean?

A negative result means that antibodies were not detected. This can indicate that you have not had a COVID-19 infection in the past or that antibodies have decreased to a level that can no longer be detected.

Can my test be positive because I have had a COVID-19 vaccine?

Yes, the COVID-19 vaccine immunity test measures SARS-CoV-2 S antibodies (spike protein antibodies). These antibodies can be made in response to any of the vaccines currently in use. A positive result can also occur from previous exposure to the virus that causes COVID-19.

If you have had a vaccine and would like to check if you have previously had the COVID-19 virus, you might want to get our combined COVID-19 Antibody and Vaccine Immunity Test. This test bundle can also tell you if you have previously had the COVID-19 virus.

Does a positive antibody test mean I am immune to COVID-19?

A positive test result indicates that you have had an immune response to vaccination or the virus. Unfortunately, a positive result does not mean that you are immune to the virus. It cannot tell you whether or not you can become ill with COVID-19 again. Nor can it tell you whether or not you can spread the virus to others. You should continue to follow all government guidance and restrictions.

Does this test tell me whether I have COVID-19 now?

No, this test does not tell you if you have a current COVID-19 infection. This test can only tell you if you have had COVID-19 in the past or an immune response to a COVID-19 vaccine.

If you have symptoms of COVID-19 that started less than eight days ago, then a PCR test can tell you if you have COVID-19.

How accurate is the test?

Our NHS accredited labs use the Roche Anti-SARS-CoV-2 S test

Studies by the manufacturer have found that this test has a 98.8% sensitivity and a 99.98% specificity.

This means that:

  • The test might miss someone who has previously had the virus in approximately 1 out of 100 people (a false negative result).
  • The test might incorrectly be positive in 1 in 5000 people who have not had a vaccine or the COVID-19 virus (a false positive result).

Our labs have performed their own verification to ensure that the test is fit-for-purpose and works with our home testing kits.

How does the COVID-19 vaccine immunity test work?

The test measures a sample of your blood to look for antibodies to SARS-CoV-2 spike protein (including IgG antibodies). The spike protein is produced by the virus that causes COVID-19. The spike protein is also used by all currently available vaccines to generate an immune response. The body responds to the virus or vaccine by making antibodies. These antibodies are used by your immune system to help fight infection. It can take up to 2 weeks for antibodies to be seen in the blood.

How will I do this test?

1)     Take your test:

Collect your blood and microbiome sample at home.

2)     Post your sample:

Post your sample back on the same day you take the test to our laboratory using the pre-paid envelope provided.

3)     View your dashboard:

View your results and reports as well as recommended foods and recipes on your ScreenMe platform. Here you can also purchase your tailored supplements from our Health Shop.

Can this test be used as evidence for international travel?

No, the majority of international travel restrictions require you to take a COVID-19 PCR test prior to travel. This is to indicate that you do not have a current COVID-19 infection. A COVID-19 antibody test cannot be used for this purpose.

We do not issue certificates of results for either the COVID-19 Antibody Test or the COVID-19 Vaccine Immunity Test. Results will be available to view via our website.  

Some countries may waive quarantine restrictions for passengers with a positive COVID-19 antibody test. These tests must usually be conducted in a laboratory accredited by the country’s government.  For this reason, our COVID-19 Antibody Test and Vaccine Immunity Test cannot be used for this purpose.

Product.Name: Cyto-Night (Cytoplan)

Cyto-Night contains the key ingredients glycine, Montmorency cherry, magnesium and hops

  • Glycine is an amino acid. Amino acids are compounds used by the body for a number of functions including forming proteins and neurotransmitters (brain chemicals)
  • Magnesium is a mineral that is a co-factor for over 300 enzymes in the body. It has many roles including contributing to the normal functioning of the nervous system and normal psychological function
  • Hops are also included in this supplement

* Indicates no NRV

Glycine, magnesium (from magnesium citrate), Montmorency cherry powder (Prunus cerasus) (a natural source of melatonin), hops extract 4:1

One level 3ml teaspoonful with a small (60ml) glass of water stirred well, ideally taken 2 hours after food and 1 hour before retiring. Do not take with food as this will decrease the product’s effectiveness.

Product.Name: Cyto-Renew (Cytoplan)
Product.ShortDescription: Cytoplan Cyto-Renew contains acetyl L-carnitine, alpha lipoic acid, rosemary, Gingko biloba and CoQ10. Acetyl L-carnitine is an amino acid that we obtain from our diet. It is a vital component of energy metabolism playing a major role in fat metabolism. Coenzme Q10 (CoQ10) is synthesised in the body and, again, it is important for energy production. Levels may decline with age and with statin use.
Product.FullDescription:
Description:

Ageing occurs when the energy-producing components of the cell deteriorate, resulting in reduced cellular metabolic activity, the accumulation of cellular debris, and the eventual death of the cell. Cyto-Renew includes acetyl L-carnitine, alpha lipoic acid, rosemary, Gingko biloba and coenzyme Q10 (CoQ10).

  • Acetyl L carnitine is an important amino acid that we obtain from our diet. It is a vital component of energy metabolism playing a major role in fat metabolism. Its most important function is to transport fatty acids into the mitochondria of muscle cells, including heart muscle, for oxidation. The mitochondria are the power houses of cells
  • Alpha lipoic acid is soluble in both water and lipid based tissue
  • Each capsule of Cyto-Renew comprises 25mg of the herb rosemary which contains lipid-soluble flavonoids. Cyto-Renew also contains Gingko biloba, of which the active component is gingkolide
  • CoQ10 (also known as ubiquinone) is synthesised in the body. It is a vital part of energy production systems in the mitochondria, the power houses of the cells, and it can become depleted as we get older. The heart muscle uses significant quantities of CoQ10, as it is permanently active. Suitable levels of CoQ10 are even more necessary for those taking statin medication, as these drugs can inhibit the body’s synthesis of CoQ10

CoQ10 25.0mg *
Gingko Biloba extract 50:1 25.0mg *
Rosemary extract 5:1 25.0mg *

* Indicates no NRV

N-acetyl L-carnitine hydrochloride, alpha lipoic acid, capsule shell (vegetable cellulose), N-acetyl L-cysteine, coenzyme Q10, gingko biloba, rosemary, silicon dioxide.

1-2 capsules daily or take as directed by a practitioner.

This product is not recommended for children, or for pregnant or lactating women.

Product.Name: Fish Oil Capsules (Cytoplan)
Product.ShortDescription:

Cytoplan High Potency Fish Oil capsules provide 550mg EPA/DHA (omega-3 fatty acids) per 1000mg capsule and are ideal for all adults and children over ten years of age.

  • Cytoplan Fish Oil capsules are made from whole oily fish: sardine and anchovy
  • We do not use fish livers because oily fish are often harvested from polluted water where heavy metals can accumulate in the liver
  • All fish oil products sold by Cytoplan are clean, stable and have NO trace of any of the ocean pollutants, heavy metals, etc. (Detection is now possible in parts per million). The filtering process uses cold water, low pressure distillation and no solvents
  • Per capsule composition: EPA 330mg, DHA 220mg; Omega-3 Content 550mg; Total Oil Content 1000mg

DHA contributes to:

  • The maintenance of normal brain function (the beneficial effect is obtained with a daily intake of 250mg of DHA)
  • The maintenance of normal vision (the beneficial effect is obtained with a daily intake of 250mg of DHA)

Maternal intake of DHA contributes to the normal development of the brain and eyes of the foetus and breastfed infants (the beneficial effect is obtained with a daily intake of 200mg of DHA in addition to 250mg of EPA and DHA)

Docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) intake contributes to the normal visual development of infants up to 12 months of age (the beneficial effect is obtained with a daily intake of 100mg of DHA)

DHA and EPA contribute to:

  • the normal function of the heart
  • normal blood pressure (the beneficial effect is obtained with a daily intake of 3g EPA/DHA)
  • normal (fasting) blood concentrations of triglycerides (the beneficial effect is obtained with a daily intake of 3g of EPA or 2g of DHA)

Product.Name: L-Carnitine 500mg (Lamberts)
Product.ShortDescription:
Pure, free-form that is ready to be absorbed
Each capsule provides a full 500mg of pure L-Carnitine
Provided by 745mg of a compound called L-Carnitine L-tartrate
A form that is ready to be absorbed by the body without needing to be broken down by digestive enzymes
Made in the UK to pharmaceutical GMP standards
Some companies label their product as if this compound is 100% L-Carnitine, but it is actually only 67% L-Carnitine
Product.FullDescription:
Product Description

Carnitine is an important amino acid made by the body from lysine. Its most important known metabolic function is to transport long chain fatty acids into the mitochondria of muscle cells for oxidation. Cardiac muscle is especially dependent upon this mechanism as an important source of metabolic energy. Due to its physiological role, L-Carnitine supplementation is often chosen by sports people.

In addition carnitine has a role in the thermogenesis (heat production) of brown adipose tissue, and in the regulation of gluconeogenesis. For this reason it is often taken as a supplement by slimmers.

Carnitine may enhance sperm motility and aid male fertility in some cases.

The main source of carnitine in our diet comes from red meat and dairy foods, whilst dietary supplementation of L-Carnitine can safeguard intake of this metabolically essential substance.

Lamberts® L-Carnitine is a pure, free-form amino acid that is ready to be absorbed by the body without needing to be broken down by digestive enzymes. Each capsule provides a full 500mg of L-Carnitine.

Other information

Cautions
This product is not recommended for children or pregnant or lactating women.

Storage instructions
To be stored in a cool dry place and protected from light.

White powder in a clear hard shell capsule.

Each capsule delivers:

L-Carnitine Tartrate 745mg
Providing L-Carnitine 500mg

Usage and administation

An amino acid is best taken ½ hour before any meal or at bedtime.

Product.Name: Magnesium 375 (as Hydroxide, Oxide, Citrate & Carbonate) 100% NRV (Lamberts)
Product.ShortDescription:
Lamberts® Magnesium 375 provides 100% NRV of magnesium
Easy to swallow tablets
One a day formula
Unique blend of 4 different magnesium compounds
Magnesium contributes to the maintenance of normal bones and the normal functioning of the nervous system
It also contributes to maintaining normal muscle function, including the heart muscle
And is also increasingly recognised as a nutrient that contributes to a reduction of tiredness and fatigue.
Product.FullDescription:
According to official data 72% of women and 42% of men in the UK fail to consume sufficient dietary magnesium. Subsequently, magnesium insufficiency has become commonplace. The effects of magnesium insufficiency are wide-ranging and include the occurrence of muscle cramps, fatigue and many symptoms of premenstrual syndrome. This important mineral is essential for bone growth and the proper functioning of nerves and muscles, especially those of the heart and lungs. A magnesium supplement is the ideal way to safeguard against a deficiency and bolster body stores, provided that the supplement contains a good level of the mineral and that it is in a form, which the body can easily absorb and utilise.Lamberts® new Magnesium 375 product provides the full 100% NRV of magnesium. This is an excellent level of magnesium and it is provided in the form of a unique blend of 4 different magnesium compounds - Hydroxide, Oxide, Citrate and Carbonate. This one a day tablet is an excellent partner for most multivitamin formulas and an ideal choice for those clients that prefer a smaller tablet size.

Product.Name: Meno-Boost Daily (MPowder)
Product.ShortDescription: MPowder's unique menopause supplement blends the best wholefoods, botanicals, vitamins and minerals to target: Hot Flashes, Depleted Energy, Sleep, Anxiety, Brain Fog, Blood Pressure, Heart Health & more.
Product.FullDescription:
• 24+ science-backed wholefood-led ingredients, including KSM-66 Ashwagandha, Maca, Slippery Elm, Red Clover, Rosehip and Pomegranate seed extract
  • Complete vitamin complex includes A, D, K, C & B6
  • Rich in antioxidants, amino acids & minerals
  • Easily take as part of your morning routine, in a drink, smoothie or breakfast bowl

Full Ingredient list

Rosehip Powder, Maca Powder, Organic Lucuma Powder, Calcium Lactate, Strawberry Powder, Montmorency Cherry Powder, Papaya Fruit Powder, Guava Powder, Magnesium Glycinate, Slippery Elm Bark Powder, Calcium Ascorbate Powder, Lemon Balm Extract, Pomegranate Seed Extract, Organic KSM-66® Ashwagandha, Ahiflower®, Potassium Chloride, Bamboo Extract, Red Clover Extract, Cranberry Extract, Zinc Picolinate, Ferrous Bisglycinate, Nicotinamide, Vita-algae D™, Vitamin D3 Preparation, Calcium D-Pantothenate, Vitamin A, Vitamin K2 MK-7, Pyridoxal 5-Phosphate, Chromium Picolinate, Thiamine Hydrochloride, Riboflavin, Copper Citrate, Folic Acid, Potassium Iodide.

Is MENO-BOOST right for me?

MENO-BOOST is designed to be taken from the age of 50, or from when your postmenopause phase begins (12 months from the date of your last period). If you’re not sure which stage of menopause you should speak to a healthcare professional.

How to take it

Nourish your body and mind each morning with three tablespoons (30g) of MENO-BOOST powder supplement: 

• Blend with 200ml of cold liquid - water, plant milk, fruit juice

• Add to your morning smoothie

• Mix into a breakfast bowl with yoghurt or milk. 

• For best results, use a blender or shaker. 

Essential Nutritional Information

Per 30g serving*

Energy 79kcal | Fat 0.4g | Sugar 6.2g | Fibre 2.1g | Protein 1.3g | Salt 0.0g

*prepared with water

Product warnings

Suitable for adults only. Product should be stored out of the reach of young children. Food supplements should not be used as a substitute for a varied diet. Do not exceed the stated recommended daily dose. Not suitable for use during planned pregnancy, pregnancy or breastfeeding. The presence of red clover may make this blend unsuitable for some. If you are under medical supervision or taking any medication, please consult your doctor before use.

  • Halal

Quantity: 60

Can capsule be opened and sprinkled onto food?: Yes

Directions: 

Take two capsules daily with food. 

Storage: 

Store in a cool, dry place away from direcr sunlight and heat. 

Warnings:

If you are pregnant, breast-feeding, have a medical condition or are under medical supervision, please consult a doctor before use
Not suitable for children
Do not exceed the recommended daily intake/dose
Do not purchase or consume if the seal is broken
Keep out of reach of children
Food supplements should not be used as a substitute for a varied and balanced diet and healthy lifestyle
Additional Warnings:
Red clover should also not be taken by women who are using contraceptive drugs, such as birth control pills. The isoflavones in the red clover could compete with the oestrogen in the contraceptive, decreasing its effect.
Women who are using HRT (hormone replacement therapy) should not take red clover, as it could interact with the effects of the therapy.
Due to estrogenic activity, red clover should not be taken by pregnant or breastfeeding women.

Product.Name: Men's fertility hormones and semen microbiome package
Product.ShortDescription: Our comprehensive, at-home fertility testing for men which includes fertility hormones and sperm test This comprehensive test allows to examine whether your hormones or sperm is getting in the way of successful conception. With the help of ScreenMe health expert you can personalise your nutrition and supplements to maximise your fertility and reach optimal health.
Product.FullDescription:
Who is it for:

Do you want a comprehensive health check you can do safely at home? Are you not in need of a consultation? Or are you social distancing? This test provides an in-depth look into your reproductive and general health without the need for a clinic or nurse visit. It also includes a report from your NHS registered medical doctor and tailored nutrition placed into your ScreenMe eat well plate.

 

What’s included:

1) We will test your blood makers related to:

  • Hormone levels

2) Gold standard semen microbiome analysis 

3) One free consultation with a ScreenMe fertility nutritionist 

3) Personalised nutritional and lifestyle guidance tailored to your specific results and needs

4) Access to the ScreenMe platform to find all your fertility products and nutritional guidance all-in-one place.

5) Unlimited email support 

 

What’s tested:

This test will provide you with the following results: 

Hormones levels

  •        Follicle-Stimulating Hormone: It helps us understand your hormonal regulation
  •        Oestradiol: In high amounts can interfere with normal sperm production
  •        Luteinizing Hormone: It helps us understand your hormonal regulation
  •        Prolactin: Has been associated with low libido and erectile dysfunction
  •        SHBG: controls how much testosterone is available to the body for use
  •        Testosterone: sex hormone affecting many aspects of fertility in men 
  •        Free Androgen Index: Used to look for abnormal androgen levels 

 Semen Microbiome analysis 

  • All bacteria present in semen 

Once measured, it is easier to manage:

At ScreenMe we believe that humans are better than computer artificial intelligence. Your results will be assessed personally by a range of health professionals such as:

  • Accredited medical doctors
  • Fertility Nutritionist
  • Specialist Scientist

Our nutritionist will select food items tailored to your specific needs to help guide you through your health and fertility journey. All your results and recommendation can be accessed at anytime and anyplace on the online ScreenMe platform.

 

How it works:

1)     Take your test:

Collect your blood and semen sample at home.

2)     Send your sample:

  • Post your samples back on the same day you take the test to our laboratory using the pre-paid envelope provided. 

3)     View your dashboard:

View your results and reports as well as recommended foods and recipes on your ScreenMe platform. Here you can also purchase your tailored supplements from our Health Shop.

 

Special Instructions:

Avoid taking biotin supplements for 2 days prior to this test. Hormonal medication or steroids can affect the results of this test.  Avoid taking the sample from a finger used to handle hormone gels or hormone pessaries in the past 4 weeks. 

It is recommended to practive abstinance for 3 days priror to collecting your semen swab. 

How long for results?:

Blood results and report are received 5-7 days following the Lab receiving your sample.

Semen microbiome results are received 4-5 weeks following the lab receiving your sample.

Our partner labs are trusted by the NHS and private clinics, so you can expect the highest standards from our accredited laboratories.

  •        Follicle-Stimulating Hormone: It helps us understand your hormonal regulation
  •        Oestradiol: In high amounts can interfere with normal sperm production
  •        Luteinizing Hormone: It helps us understand your hormonal regulation
  •        Prolactin: Has been associated with low libido and erectile dysfunction
  •        SHBG: controls how much testosterone is available to the body for use
  •        Testosterone: sex hormone affecting many aspects of fertility in men 
  •        Free Androgen Index: Used to look for abnormal androgen levels 

 

Vitamins 

  •        Vitamin D
  •        Vitamin B12
  •        Folate

 

Minerals

  •        Iron profile
  •        Magnesium
  •        Zinc

 

Cholesterol Status

  •        Cholesterol profile

  

Diabetes Marker

  •        HbA1c

 

Once measured, it is easier to manage:

At ScreenMe we believe that humans are better than computer artificial intelligence. Your results will be assessed personally by a range of health professionals such as:

  • Accredited medical doctors
  • Fertility Nutritionist
  • Specialist Scientist

Our nutritionist will select food items tailored to your specific needs to help guide you through your health and fertility journey. All your results and recommendation can be accessed at anytime and anyplace on the online ScreenMe platform.

 

How it works:

1)     Take your test:

Collect your blood sample at home.

2)     Post your sample:

Post your sample back on the same day you take the test to our laboratory using the pre-paid envelope provided.

3)     View your dashboard:

View your results and reports as well as recommended foods and recipes on your ScreenMe platform. Here you can also purchase your tailored supplements from our Health Shop.

 

Special Instructions:

Avoid taking biotin supplements for 2 days prior to this test. Hormonal medication or steroids can affect the results of this test.  Avoid taking the sample from a finger used to handle hormone gels or hormone pessaries in the past 4 weeks. 

 

Laboratories and products, you can trust:

Our partner labs are trusted by the NHS and private clinics, so you can expect the highest standards from our accredited laboratories.

At ScreenMe our health professionals spend a lot of time reviewing and selecting the highest quality supplements and health products available on the market, so you don’t have to. From testing through to health consultations and products all this can be easily accessed in the ScreenMe Health Shop.

Product.Name: Methylfolate (Cytoplan)
Product.ShortDescription: Provides folic acid as methylfolate (5-MTHF) which is a stable and methylated form of folate. Methylfolate fulfils all the known uses of folic acid. Many supplements contain folic acid, however, folic acid has to undergo a number of steps within the body in order to be converted to the active form. If methylfolate supplementation is indicated, we recommend taking an all-round multi that includes all the B vitamins, including B12, as a foundation. This product could be taken in addition, if needed, on the advice of a health practitioner.
Product.FullDescription:
Description:

Provides folic acid as methylfolate (5-MTHF) which is a stable and methylated form of folate. Methylfolate fulfils all the known uses of folic acid. Many supplements contain folic acid, however, folic acid has to undergo a number of steps within the body in order to be converted to the active form – 5-MTHF. The final step in this conversion is carried out in the body by an enzyme called MTHFR and some people have genetic mutations which means this enzyme has reduced efficiency in converting folic acid to 5-MTHF. Methylfolate does not need to be converted; it is in the active form, ready for use by the body.

  • One of the functions of folic acid is contributing to normal homocysteine metabolism. This is important as high homocysteine is a risk factor for chronic diseases including cardiovascular disease and cognitive decline
  • Folate is used in the methylation cycle – the purpose of this cycle, which occurs in all cells of the body, is to create S-adenosylmethionine (SAM), the universal methyl donor. SAM is used in many metabolic processes that require a methyl group

Folate contributes to normal:

  • psychological function
  • blood formation
  • homocysteine metabolism
  • maternal tissue growth during pregnancy
  • immune system function
  • amino acid synthesis

Folate contributes to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue

Folate has a role in the process of cell division

Supplemental folic acid intake increases maternal folate status. Low maternal folate status is a risk factor in the development of neural tube defects in the developing foetus. NB: we include methylfolate (i.e. folic acid) in our pregnancy multivitamin and mineral called Pregna-Plan at the government’s recommended dose for pregnancy of 400µg of folic acid per day.

Folic Acid as L-Methylfolate 400µg 200
 
  
+NRV = Nutritional Reference Value
* Indicates no NRV

Product.FullDescription:
Description:

Our protein powder is a blend of vegan protein (from brown rice, pea, hemp, pumpkin, sunflower and chickpea protein) to provide a full spectrum of amino acids. It is also a comprehensive multi vitamin and mineral providing optimum levels of nutrients including CoQ10, methylcobalamin (B12) and vitamin D3. In addition, this supplement contains 2 strains of probiotics, Lactobacillus Acidophilus andBifidobacterium Breve, as well as the prebiotic fibre inulin and protease enzymes to provide digestive support. This formulation also contains beta glucans for immune suppport and lacuma powder.

This protein powder is free of complex carbohydrates, sugars and sweeteners and is therefore useful for individuals who are following a carbohydrate-restricted diet. It can also be used as a full meal replacement supplement if blended with fruit to provide carbohydrate. In addition, it may be used as a multi vitamin and mineral by providing levels of optimum nutrients. It is a particularly useful supplement to a vegan diet by providing 14g of protein per 20 gram serving as well as iron, B12 and iodine, all of which can be lacking in vegan diets.

  • Protein powders can help to support weight loss by increasing satiety and reducing hunger and appetite when used as part of a balanced diet.
  • Providing lean protein can help regulate blood sugar levels by slowing the release of sugar into the blood as well as increasing feelings of satiety.
  • Lactobacillus Acidophilus and Bifidobacterium Breve are commensal bacteria found in the gastrointestinal tract
  • Prebiotic inulin support probiotic strains

Product.Name: Myo-Inositol Powder (Lamberts)
Product.ShortDescription:
Lamberts® powdered Myo-inositol is 100% natural
Easy and convenient way to supplement the diet
Highly soluble, pleasant tasting powdered form
Suitable for vegetarians and vegans
Free 0.5g scoop included
Product.FullDescription:
Myo-inositol, closely associated with the vitamin B-complex, is just one of nine different types of inositol. It is produced in the body and is also the form most commonly found in nature, such as in foods like fruits, beans and nuts.

Myo-inositol plays an important role as the structural basis for a number of secondary messengers and in recent years has been studied extensively in relation to its role in insulin signalling. Supplementation has become popular and it is now widely recommended by practitioners, particularly for those with Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS).

Lamberts® powdered Myo-inositol is 100% natural and affords an easy and convenient way to supplement the diet with daily doses of 4g, which is the level used in the majority of studies. Many inositol capsules contain just 500mg.

Our highly soluble, pleasant tasting powdered form is suitable for vegetarians and vegans, and is easily mixed into a glass of water or juice.

Product.FullDescription:
Description:

NAC is a highly stable and bioavailable form of the amino acid cysteine. Amino acids are compounds used by the body for a number of functions including forming proteins. Proteins are required by the human body for the repair, maintenance and growth of tissue where they perform structural roles.

  • NAC is renowned for its ability to replenish levels of the glutathione, the body’s master antioxidant.
  • NAC also plays an important role in the body’s detoxification process, respiratory and circulatory system, as well as regulating levels of glutamate, the most important neurotransmitter in the brain.
  • L-cysteine is one of the amino acids to contain sulphur, NAC has a strong sulphur like odour, which is completely normal.
  • Each capsule comprises 500mg of N-Acetyl-L-Cysteine
  • NAC has also been shown to increase nitric oxide production, which helps veins dilate and improve blood flow and enhance circulation.L-cysteine important for keratin synthesis for healthy skin, hair and nails
  • L-cysteine is a non-essential amino acid, however the ability to synthesis it decreases with age. Levels of cysteine may become depleted in a number of health conditions, also during times of stress, low immunity, or poor protein intake, therefore the requirement for cysteine can increase beyond the body’s ability to synthesis.
  • Easy to swallow one a day capsule
  • This product is not suitable for children, pregnant or lactating women.
  • NAC has also been shown to increase nitric oxide production, which helps veins dilate and improve blood flow and enhance circulation

Product.Name: Natural Form Vitamin E 250iu (Lamberts)
Product.ShortDescription:
(as d-alpha Tocopherol)
 
Contributes to the protection of the body's cells from oxidative stress caused by reactive compounds called 'free radicals'
Natural form of d-alpha tocopherol, as this is the form in which it occurs in foods
Natural vitamin E is absorbed and retained more readily by the body than synthetic vitamin E
Extracted from a natural vegetable oil and supplied in gelatin free capsules
Manufactured in the UK in premises that operate to stringent pharmaceutical standards of GMP
Daily Intake: 1 to 2 capsules
Product.FullDescription:
Product Description 

Lamberts® Vitamin E capsules present vitamin E in its natural form of d-alpha-tocopherol, which is how it occurs in foodstuffs such as nuts and vegetable oils. It is in the form of d-alpha-tocopherol that vitamin E is easily absorbed. The vitamin E used in these Lamberts® products is naturally sourced from vegetable oil.

Natural vitamin E (referred to as 'd-alpha tocopherol') has been shown scientifically to possess twice the potency of its synthetic counterpart (dl-alpha tocopherol) and has been hailed by many researchers as one of the most important dietary antioxidants known to man.

Vitamin E protects every cell in the body from free radicals through its antioxidant properties and this protective role has put vitamin E at the centre of worldwide research. Studies indicate that it may help maintain the health of the heart by protecting polyunsaturated fats in the body from being oxidised into saturated fats and so protect all membranes including those in the lungs and blood vessels. Vitamin E is also recommended during the menopause and to maintain a healthy skin and reproductive system.

Each capsule provides 250iu of vitamin E. Produced in premises that operate to stringent pharmaceutical standards of GMP.

Cautions

Hypertensive persons supplementing with Vitamin E should commence on a low amount of iu. and gradually increase the amount under practitioner's supervision. Those using prescription blood-thinning medication (anticoagulants) or aspirin should consult their doctor before using Vitamin E supplements.

Product.Name: Omega 3 Vegan

Product.FullDescription:
Description:

Cytoplan's Omega 3 Vegan is derived from the plant marine algae Schizochytrium sp microalgae. This supplement offers a good source of vegan DHA and EPA for vegetarians and vegans. Algal omega-3 oil has been commercially available for a while but it did not contain meaningful amounts of EPA.

  • An algal source of omega-3 fatty acids - rich in both DHA and EPA
  • Derived from a completely vegan source - Schizochytrium sp microalgae
  • From microalgae that are grown in a controlled environment, eliminating the risk of oceanic contamination
  • From start to finish, it is produced in an FDA-inspected facility, under current Good Manufacturing Practice (cGMP) regulations

DHA contributes to:

  • the maintenance of normal brain function (the beneficial effect is obtained with a daily intake of 250mg of DHA)
  • the maintenance of normal vision

Docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) intake contributes to the normal visual development of infants up to twelve months of age (the beneficial effect is obtained with a daily intake of 100mg of DHA)

Maternal intake of DHA contributes to the normal development of the brain and eyes of the foetus and breastfed infants (the beneficial effect is obtained with a daily intake of 200mg of DHA in addition to 250mg of EPA and DHA)

DHA and EPA contribute to:

  • the maintenance of normal blood pressure (the beneficial effect is obtained with a daily intake of 3g of EPA and DHA)
  • the maintenance of normal blood triglyceride levels (the beneficial effect is obtained with a daily intake of 2g of EPA and DHA)

EPA and DHA contribute to the normal function of the heart (the beneficial effect is obtained with a daily intake of 250mg of EPA and DHA)

  

Omega 3 Vegan, 2 capsules will provide on average:

 
Active Nutrient Strength %NRV*
Vegan Omega 3 1000.0mg
Which provides:
DHA 334.0mg
EPA 166.0mg
 
+NRV = Nutritional Reference Value
* Indicates no NRV
  

Ingredients:

Schizochytrium sp. from marine algae providing DHA & EPA, soft gel capsule (modified cornstarch, glycerol, carrageenan), tocopherol (antioxidant), sunflower oil, ascorbyl palmitate.

  

Suggested Intake:

1-2 capsules daily or take as directed by a practitioner.

  

Suitable for:

People with Candida and yeast sensitivities.

  

Contraindications:

If you are on blood-thinning medication or have any deficiency of the liver consult your doctor before taking this product.

Soft gel capsule (modified cornstarch, glycerol, carrageenan), tocopherol (antioxidant), sunflower oil, ascorbyl palmitate.

  

Non GM & Free From:

wheat, gluten, soy, yeast, dairy, added sugars, colours, artificial flavours and preservatives.

  

Storage:

Keep cool, dry & out of direct sunlight.

Ideal if you

  • Suspect you have PCOS, and want to screen for it.
